articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Rail fares to be frozen in England next year
articles.description: Regulated fares, which include season tickets and off-peak returns, will not see annual price rises for the first time in 30 years, the government announces.
articles.content:
The announcement comes days before the chancellor sets out the government's financial plans in the Budget, amid a focus on the cost of living.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Could the Budget help turn Generation Z into generation debt?
articles.description: There's growing concern that current tax and spending policies help pensioners, but are unfair on younger generations.
articles.content:
Chancellor Rachel Reeves' upcoming Budget is expected to justify tax increases as a vital measure to keep the UK's national debt under control.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Electric Car Grant : £1.3bn boost for EV scheme expected in Budget
articles.description: But it is also possible electric vehicle owners could face a new tax elsewhere in Wednesday's Budget.
articles.content:
All new cars will have to be electric or hybrid from 2030, when a ban on the sale of new petrol and diesel cars comes into force.
